    News

    Latest updates from the Artificial Scientific Intelligence Lab team.

    2025

    • August 2025

      Yizhen Liao and Rushi Shah joined our team as PhD students!

    • May 2025

      Our cell memory work was accepted by Genome Biology.

    • April 2025

      Our distributional shift paper for medical records was accepted by npj Digital Medicine.

    • March 2025

      Our evolutionary GFlowNet paper was accepted by TMLR!

    • March 2025

      Our discrete representation for federated learning paper was accepted by ICML.

    • January 2025

      Dr. Ye Zhang joined our team as visiting faculty. Samson Yu and Qiran Zou joined our team as PhD students!

    2024

    • October 2024

      Decoupled Straight-Through Discrete Optimization available online. [Link]

    • October 2024

      Gaussian Mixture Continual Learning available online. [Link]

    • October 2024

      Discrete Concept Unlearning available online. [Link]

    • October 2024

      Brain-Inspired Continual Learning available online. [Link]

    • September 2024

      AI Safety in Medicine review available online. [Link]

    • June 2024

      BarlowTwins-CXR published in BMC. [Link]

    2023

    • November 2023

      Our exploration of generative models for causal discovery of gene networks Swift-DynGFN was accepted at the NeurIPS Generative Models for Biology workshop. Congratulations to Trang and all co-authors. [Link]

    • November 2023

      COAT large language model task available. [Link]

    • September 2023

      Our work Reusable Slotwise Mechanisms was accepted at NeurIPS 2023. Congratulations to Trang and all co-authors. [Link]

    • July 2023

      We presented our GFlowOut work at ICML 2023 in Hawaii. [Link]

    • June 2023

      Our two-year effort on Attention Schema will be presented at the NeurIPS InForCog workshop. [Link]

    • April 2023

      We presented our SAF paper at ICLR 2023 in Kigali, Rwanda. [Link]
